3: Roland, are you still studying this female?
Pretty interesting, huh? Not really dead, but not alive either. In that state, how does she see herself...
...and see this world? I am quite interested in this.
Save the research for later. Miss Luna wants us to gather.
It's that one from before, right? I was just about to report to her about the Venus Splash Park.
Then Gestalt... I mean, what about Huaxu? You managed to get it with a lot of trouble, but are you going to set it aside for now?
It is Miss Luna's will.
You would think that I'd be worried that things will get worse the longer it gets dragged out... but it is Miss Luna's decision, so be it.
Lamia.
...Uh, yes, so... So how is it?
It's as you just heard. Gabriel and I will go first. The rest of the preparations are in your hands.
Preparations...?
I'm talking about the part that's related to Gestalt. What we have is just the 'key' after all. The location of the main body is our problem.
Do you have to? If you ask Lady Luna, will she answer for sure?
If we just wait around for the answer to be announced, we won't even know how we've died. You don't want to become like 'that guy' right?
I'm counting on you, Lamia.
Gabriel ceremoniously takes off his hat and follows Roland's footsteps to the exit, then their footsteps fade.
Tch...
